StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary:
● Over 12+ years of experience in IT Industry as Software Professional.
● Experience in Project Management, Team Leading, Application Architecture Development and Software Development, Database Design, DBA, Android app development.
● Hands on experience in PHP, Mysql, Angular based open source development, and usage of various open source frameworks.
● Good understanding of android mobile applications.
● Good understanding of frontend technologies like Angular, React etc.
● Good understanding of Databases and Database design concepts.
● Good understanding of various Internet Protocols and Internet Servers like web server (Apache, IIS), FTP server, AWS server management & deployment & Google cloud, Compute engine etc.
● Good understanding of Database design & performance optimization.
● Good exposure in presales & client demo activities.
● Interacting with client, analyzing resolutions for feedbacks provided and further implementation.
● Leadership Skills, Decision Making, Problem Solving, and Stress Management.

PositionHistory.Title: Technical /Solution Architect
PositionHistory.Description:
Duration: 1.4 Year + Description: KapitalTM is a product developed by Knowarth technologies for HR & Payroll domain keeping in mind to SME & Micro SME companies to manage employee lifecycle on one unified platform. Major module include Recruitment, Onboarding, Times & attendance, Payroll Management, Core HR (Leaves, Employee Data, etc), Employee Engagement, HR Workflows, Talent management, Expense Management, Helpdesk, MIS L& reports, Role based dynamic dashboard, ACL , Roles & permissions etc with everting configurable through backend interfaces.

In this project I am playing role of Technical /Solution Architect which is responsible of technical deigns, requirement analysis, Database design, Quality & functional testing. Around 15 + developers, QA, BA, DBA are reporting to me in this project.

● Technology	php 7.2, Angular 7, Mysql 5.6,
● Platform	Linux/CentOS
● Application/Web Server	Nginx, Load balancer,
● Database	MySql 5.6
● Operating System	Linux CentOS
● Team Size	15
● Role	Technical Architect, DBA,
● Tool	Redis, GIT Labs, Zoho

Project: KA PMS
Client: Bharatnet, Knowarth
Duration: 1.0 Year + Description: KA PMS is a product developed by Knowarth technologies for managing whole project lifecycle of Infra & GIS Infra related projects like Telecom, Smart Cities, Bhratnet implementation.
This application have features tike projects at different types & geo location based, task management which includes priority, severity, timelines, due date, assignment, milestone mapping, financial implications, location mapping & many more. Apart from this there was WBS, reports, role based dashboard, timesheet, ROW management, workflow management etc.

In this project I was playing role of Technical/Solution Architect which is responsible of technical deigns, requirement analysis, Database design, Quality & functional testing. Around 10+ developers, QA, BA, DBA are reporting to me in this project.


● Technology	php 7.2, Angular 7, Mysql 5.6,
● Platform	Linux/CentOS
● Application/Web Server	Nginx, Load balancer,
● Database	MySql 5.6
● Operating System	Linux CentOS
● Team Size	10
● Role	Technical Architect, DBA
● Tool	Redis, GIT Labs, Zoho


Project: infraprix.com
Client: Paramount Group & more
Duration: 1 Year + Description: infraprix.comTM is a product developed by Technoxom Pvt. Ltd   Paramount group company   for solving Infra & real estate industry problems related to raw material purchase & price negotiation. Using this platform Builders & Infra company can purchase all kind of raw material in bulk , infraprix team also help in price negotiation to reduce material cost. On other side sellers & manufacturers can place their products for sale. Thus infraprix.com provides global reach to sellers as well as buyers.

● Technology	php 5.6, Angular 2, Node.js, Mysql 5.6, AWS cloud
● Platform	AWS cloud
● Application/Web Server	Nginx, Load balancer,
● Database	MySql 5.6, Hadoop
● Operating System	Linux Ubuntu
● Team Size	10
● Role	Technical Project Manager
● Tool	Redis, RabbitMQ, GIT , Google Maps API , Yodiz


Project: mediakart.com
Client: Paramount Group
Duration: 1 Year + Description: mediakart.comTM is a product developed by Technoxom Pvt. Ltd   Paramount group company   for solving media & advertising industry problems for outdoor media   OOH   advertising. Using this platform agencies can sell/ purchase hoarding , billboards screens etc. Some advance features are traffic monitoring , 360 view of billboard, live monitoring , campaign management, collection tracking etc

● Technology	php 5.6, Laravel 5.3,  Mysql 5.6, AWS cloud, Angular2
● Platform	AWS cloud
● Application/Web Server	Nginx, Load balancer
● Database	MySql 5.6, Hadoop
● Operating System	Linux Ubuntu
● Team Size	10
● Role	Solution Architect
● Tool	RabbitMQ, Redis, GIT , Google Maps API


Project: izooto.com
Client: AMLPL, OLX, zopper & more
Duration: 8 months +

Description: izooto.comTM is a product /platform   SaaS   developed by AMLPL for intelligent push notification for chrome & safari browser for desktop, mobile & tablets users. Using this platform, any partner/ website owner can engage with customers for promotional offers & updates. This opens another channel for advertisers to reach customer, like as SMS, Email, IVR, OBD etc. Behind this platform there is a strong data management & analysis system   DMP   which enables this as a very intelligent push notification system. Here partners can create campaign, define user base on device, OS, city , state, price slab & more filters.

● Technology	php 5.3, Mysql 5.5, java, C
● Platform	Google cloud & Compute Engine
● Application/Web Server	Apache 2.0, Google Load balancer.
● Database	MySql 5.2, Cassandra, Aerospike
● Operating System	Linux
● Team Size	6
● Role	Technical Project Manager
● Tool	Spark, Kafka Q management, memcache SVN

Responsibilities:
● Software Development, Architecture, Testing, release.
● Code reviews and pair programming
● Application Deployment
● R&D of all technical stuff

Project: BubDub (com.amlpl.bubdub)
Client: AMLPL
Duration: 8 months
Other Apps: appbazaar (com.amlpl.mbazaarappstore.appbazaar), appbazaar  CustomerApp (com.amlpl.appbazaar.customerApp) ,  mBazaarStore (com.ampl.mbazaarstore)

Description: BubdubTM is a Android native app that enables users to access basic utilities like selfie camera, torch, calculator, maps on single click. User can also customize there choice apps.It also provides incent based app installation platform, by using this you can install popular apps.

Responsibilities:

● Code reviews and pair programming
● Project Management & Client communication

Client: SWGlobal
Duration: 9 months
Description: Pay4Bill is a complete billing solution which enables merchant to create & present bills to customers. The platform provides multi-level access like as Admin, merchant, Merchant Sub User, Bank teller, Report Admin User. Every user has a role based access.

● Technology	PHP 5.3
● Platform	Symfony 1.4 & Doctrine
● Application/Web Server	Apache 2.0,  NGINX

Project: Gini Marketplace apps & Gini Chrome Extension
Client: OSSCube Solutions.
Duration: 1.5 Year
Description: Gini is about making life easier for sales, marketing, and service users.Gini makes it easy and efficient by embedding SugarCRM directly within your Email.Gini easily integrates with LinkedIn, Twitter, Google+, and Facebook to enable you immediately see information about the person and their company at one place.You can easily synchronize Email, Contacts and Calendars with one click.
Here you can view person social/corporate profile, related email, related attachments, related CRM activities etc. Same can also be created / modified directly from your inbox. Thus Gini enables you to handle social activities as well as corporate work at single place.
It also connects your Phone with the Customers Phone for superior call quality.
Right now there are two version of Gini, one is browser & OS independent called Gini Google apps marketplace app & second is more performance oriented that is Chrome extension.


● Technology	PHP 5.3, LINUX.
● Platform	ZF2.0, SugarCRM, Google Marketplace, Chrome Web store, Memcache
● Application/Web Server	Apache 2.0
● Databases	MySql 5
● Operating System	Windows 7/XP, Linux
● Team Size	6
● Role	Project Leader
● Tool	jQuery,Handlebar,underscore, Google, FB, twitter, linkedinapis, Twilio.

Responsibilities:
● Project/Module/Resource Handling.
● Software Change/Configuration Management.
● Team's Code review to meet standards.
● Application deployment & release on AWS server.


Project: Cox & Kings Intranet Application
Client: Cox & Kings (India) Ltd.
Duration: 1.3 Year
Description: This application is the part of Cox & Kings booking automation process. Using this application staff can gook tour, hotels, cars, insurance, air tickets etc.  This application provides online quotes, booking, document management for Visa, Passport etc., maintain document approval process between different departments, all these features are role based because main business comes through travel agents, franchisees. Thus then can generate quote for any tour or program & send for approval to sales, finance team.


● Technology	PHP 5.1 & LINUX, AJAX.
● Platform	Symfony 1.3
● Application/Web Server	Apache 2.0
● Databases	MSSql
● Operating System	Windows 2000/XP, Linux
● Team Size	35
● Role	Team Leader
● Tool	Crystal Report, Memcache

Responsibilities:
● Project/Module/Resource Handling.
● Software Change/Configuration Management.
● Team's Code review to meet standards.

Project: www.keypress.com
Client: Keypress Publications
Duration: 1+ Year
Description: Sketchpad LessonLink (SLL) is a Web application that provides school subscribers with accessto multiple libraries of Sketchpad classroom activities for students.  Each activity includes Overview metadata (database fields including grade level, time, objectives, etc.) and Activity Notes (FlashPaper, for teachers), and may include a Student Worksheet (FlashPaper, for students), Student Sketch (Sketchpad, for students), and/or Presentation Sketch (Sketchpad, for teachers).SLL shall allow teachers to
(1) Browse and search activity libraries using the Overview metadata stored with activities.
(2) View activities aligned to our content strands, their textbooks or their state standards, or,
(3) View and/or print the Overview metadata stored with each activity,
(4) Launch and/or download activity documents,
(5) Store selected activities in user-defined "folders" for easy access for themselves, colleagues, or their students, and
(6) Create Web pages for students to use to access activities.

SLL shall allow students to access the student contents (Student Worksheet and Student Sketch) of activities saved into a folder via a "Class Pass," which links them to a Student Web Page defined by the teacher. The SLL application and libraries will also be available to individual teacher subscribers, families, and other publishing partners. Teachers interested in testing SLL shall be able to sign up for 30 days in a "mock" school and access a Preview Library with approximately 30 "live" activities with limited access to the metadata only for the remainder of the School Library.Access to SLL shall be through KeyOnline, Key's customer Web portal.  KeyOnline shall handle subscription to SLL for schools, registration of individual teachers at subscribing schools, and the maintenance of user accounts. My role in this project is interaction with model & controller layer, so we creates XML of the data & sends to the flex (View layer).


● Technology	PHP 5.2, MySql 5.1, FLEX
● Platform	Symfony 1.2 MVC Framework
● Application/Web Server	Apache 2.0
● Databases	MySQL
● Operating System	Windows 2000/XP, Linux
● Team Size	14
● Role	SSE
● Tool	FLEX, Scribd, Redis cache

Responsibilities:
● Scoping the Requirements
● Change Management
● Development

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 52% of this job

Degree.Comments: ● 2004- M.C.A.   U.P. Technical University Lucknow   - July 2001 to June 2004

● 2001- B.Sc.  (Graduation)   MJPRU Bareilly   - July 1998 to June 2001
● 1998- 10+2 - U.P. Board Allahabad - July 1996 to June 1998

Programming Languages: PHP, Android Java, XML, jQuery, Javascript , Angular, React
Database: MySQL, Dynamo DB, Cassandra, Aerospike, Oracle, Mongo DB
Frameworks: Laravel 5.6, Symfony 1.4, Zend 2.0, Cake, Codignator
Application Tools: Zend Studio, Netbeans, Notepad++, Android Studio , PHP CI, NPM
OS/Servers: Linux (Ubuntu, Cent OS , Redhat), Apache, Nginx, IIS, Google cloud Load balancer, Compute Engine, AWS server management & deployment, Kafka Queue, RabbitMQ
Internet Technology: Chrome/ FF Extension, Google marketplace apps, GCM based  notification, SugarCRM,   Google+, Linkedin , facebook, Twitter   API, memcache, Redis Cache

Mobile: Android native app, Cordova based app, Services, GCM, WIFI.

Technical Concepts: Software Engineering, SSAD, SEI CMM, RDBMS, SEO, Client Server Technology, OOPS

Domain Expertise: BFSI, Travel, HR & Payroll, Education, Healthcare, Advertising & Media.

(4) Launch and/or download activity documents,
(5) Store selected activities in user-defined "folders" for easy access for themselves, colleagues, or their students, and
(6) Create Web pages for students to use to access activities.

SLL shall allow students to access the student contents (Student Worksheet and Student Sketch) of activities saved into a folder via a "Class Pass," which links them to a Student Web Page defined by the teacher. The SLL application and libraries will also be available to individual teacher subscribers, families, and other publishing partners. Teachers interested in testing SLL shall be able to sign up for 30 days in a "mock" school and access a Preview Library with approximately 30 "live" activities with limited access to the metadata only for the remainder of the School Library.Access to SLL shall be through KeyOnline, Key's customer Web portal.  KeyOnline shall handle subscription to SLL for schools, registration of individual teachers at subscribing schools, and the maintenance of user accounts. My role in this project is interaction with model & controller layer, so we creates XML of the data & sends to the flex (View layer).


● Technology	PHP 5.2, MySql 5.1, FLEX
● Platform	Symfony 1.2 MVC Framework
● Application/Web Server	Apache 2.0
● Databases	MySQL
● Operating System	Windows 2000/XP, Linux
● Team Size	14
● Role	SSE
● Tool	FLEX, Scribd, Redis cache

Responsibilities:

● Scoping the Requirements
● Change Management
● Development

PANKAJ KUMAR GUPTA has 13 years of work experience, with 7 years of management experience, including a low-level position.
